mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, title, content, writer, show) values ((seq_board.nextval), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 'Y')
insert into attach(fullName, bno) values (#{fullName}, seq_board.currval)
mapper.select: select count(*) from board b, member m
